## minimalist namespace

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ConstantProvider](./blockly.minimalist_namespace.constantprovider_class.md) | An object that provides constants for rendering blocks in the sample. |
|  [Drawer](./blockly.minimalist_namespace.drawer_class.md) | An object that draws a block based on the given rendering information. |
|  [Renderer](./blockly.minimalist_namespace.renderer_class.md) | The minimalist renderer. |
|  [RenderInfo](./blockly.minimalist_namespace.renderinfo_class.md) | <p>An object containing all sizing information needed to draw this block.</p><p>This measure pass does not propagate changes to the block (although fields may choose to rerender when getSize() is called). However, calling it repeatedly may be expensive.</p> |
